name: WGJ78 Grow
description:
Weekly Game Jam Week 78; Grow.

Grow King Goodbottom. Control his loyal servants, by gathering the ripe Purple Fruits and them bring to him to consume. Watch him slowly grow.

Keyboard Controls:

  • W A S D - Move Cursor
  • O K L [;] - Move Camera
  • C - Claim Servant
  • Space - Select Servant(s), accumulative.
  • B - Order Servants to gather Fruit
  • M - Deselect Servants

Controller Controls (Xbox)

  • Left Analog Stick - Move Cursor
  • Right Analog Stick - Move Camera
  • X - Claim Servant
  • A - Select Servant(s), accumulative.
  • Y - Order Servants to gather Fruits
  • B - Deselect Servants
